{"blocks":[{"key":"74rsl","text":"Mode opératoire:
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bph4h","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cki6c","text":"Lancer le programme (voir partie “Ordinateur”)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alc7k","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aq0rj","text":"Allumer la balance et, s’il y a un niveau, vérifier qu’elle est à niveau (niveau à bulle)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0pmm","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bic2i","text":"Mettre de l’eau distilée dans le berlin (1800 ml)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c34lg","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1p6el","text":"Positioner le panier vide suspendu à la balance dans l’eau","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mphu","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9u7o3","text":"Tarer la balance, panier vide sous eau !","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d479e","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ai44","text":"Retirer le berlin","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a76rd","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8jk0","text":"Disposer l’échantillon dans le panier, à sec !","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":39,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehdcb","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ghoe","text":"Une fois que le numéro d’échantillon est correctement établit dans l’application cliquer sur “Start the Slaketest”","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21pic","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"clfeq","text":"Lorsque le graphique simple commence à se construire, rapidement replacer le panier avec l’échantillon dans l’eau en faisant attention à ce que le panier ne touche pas les bords","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ggil","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6u1ot","text":"Une fois que le slaketest est terminé (lorsque la pente est relativement nulle, générallement à partir de 1000s), cliquer sur “Stop the Slaketest”. Attendre que le graphique disparaisse (cela peut prendre quelque(s) ittération(s))","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1u83r","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"179ko","text":"Pour limiter le risque de bug, il vaut mieux allumer la balance en avance, et faire des échantillons de test en début de journée et début d’après-midi","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq7fi","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
